DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the far, intermediate and near visual acuities with a trifocal IOL.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Visual Acuity and Patient Satisfaction With AT LISA TRI 839MP Intraocular Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: After bilateral cataract surgery, monocular and binocular uncorrected (UCVA) and best distance corrected visual acuity (BCVA) will be measured at far (4m), intermediate (80 cm) and near (40 cm) distance as well as the subjective refraction. A patient questionnaire will be used to assess the patient satisfaction and spectacle independence.
DOC.criteria: Man or woman, over 50 years of age Bilateral implantation of a trifocal intraocular lens Capsular bag implantation Existing ocular pathology Surgical complications Corneal astigmatism â‰¥ 1.0D
